message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you get 40%.  We can adjust as we go.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it closer to even, I'll take 55 and you get 45.  We can still adjust in the next round if needed.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need a bit more.  Let's split it 52/48 this time. If you reject this, I'm not sure there's much room for compromise left.
